cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.29.6)
project(kiero)

include_directories("..")

find_package(Vulkan REQUIRED)

add_library(${PROJECT_NAME} STATIC kiero.cpp)

target_include_directories(${PROJECT_NAME}
        INTERFACE
        "include/"
)

target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME}
        PUBLIC
        dxgi.lib
        d3d11.lib

        Vulkan::Vulkan

        minhook
)
